item.title: Christmas Classic (?) Lighting a Christmas Tree with Raspberry Pi and Philips Hue
item.description: > This article is the 25th day article of [North Detail Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/northdetail). 2020/04/02 Addendum This article is also posted on the NorthDetail blog. https://www.northdetail.co.jp/blog/455/ Merry Christmas! Advent Calendar is Christmas on the last day, and Speaking of Christmas, it’s Razpai! So, at the end of North Detail Advent Calendar 2019, I would like to make a mechanism to control the lights that illuminate the Christmas tree with Raspberry Pi.
